name: Wooden Match 3 - Puzzle Blast
description:
Get ready for the wooden match 3 puzzle adventure! Wooden Match Three is a brand new match 3 puzzle game like no other! It makes you keep playing for FREE!

HOW TO PLAY:
- Match 3 or more wooden blocks in a line to crush them.
- Easy and fun to play, challenging to master.

This wooden matching-3 game has well designed puzzles for you to play in anytime and anywhere.
